OrderHistory.name: OrderHistory
OrderHistory.description: Represents historical information about changes that have been made to the standard fields of the associated order, or to any custom fields with history tracking enabled.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: Name of the order field that was modified, or a special value to indicate some other modification to the order.

NewValue.description: New value of the modified order field. Maximum of 255 characters.

OldValue.description: Previous value of the modified order field. Maximum of 255 characters.

OrderId.description: ID of the order associated with this record.
